name: Pull/sh
description:
A Wonky Physics Platformer Made for GMTK Jam 2021.
(The levels may be weird or difficult, I did not spend too much time on making them.)

Using the orbs/magnets, get to the end goal flag. That's the only way to get to the next level.

Controls:

  • Attract - Left Click an Orb to have the Magnet be Attracted. (Shows Orb  as Red)
  • Repel - Right Click an Orb to have the Magnet be Repelled. (Shows Orb as Blue)
  • Cancel - Middle Click an Orb to be neither Attracted or Repelled. (Shows Orb as Default)
  • Escape - Return to Main Menu
  • Space - Restarts the Current Level
